net.sf.clickclick.jquery.control
Class JQMenu

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.click.control.AbstractControl
      org.apache.click.extras.control.Menu
          net.sf.clickclick.control.menu.FlexiMenu
              net.sf.clickclick.jquery.control.JQMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.click.Control
public class JQMenu
extends net.sf.clickclick.control.menu.FlexiMenu

Provide a drop-down Menu control based on the JQuery Superfish plugin: http://users.tpg.com.au/j_birch/plugins/superfish/.

Author:
Bob Schellink
See Also:
